SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into wf_flow (FLOW_NAME, OWNER_PROJECT_ID, OWNER_EXPERIMENT_ID, SHARE_LOCK_STATE, SHARE_LOCK_MSG, NEXT_SNAPSHOT_VERSION, NODE_COUNT, NEXT_DELETE_SEQUENCE, LAST_JOB_ID, FLOW_STATE, SUMMARY, DESCRIPTION, STATUS, LAST_UPDATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_OPER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_OPER, VERSION ) values (#{flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ownerExperimentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{shareLockState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shareLockMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextSnapshotVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nodeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{nextDeleteSequence,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{lastJobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} )

mapper.update:
update wf_flow
FLOW_ID = #{record.flowId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FLOW_NAME = #{record.flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{record.ownerProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER_EXPERIMENT_ID = #{record.ownerExperimentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SHARE_LOCK_STATE = #{record.shareLockState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHARE_LOCK_MSG = #{record.shareLockMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = #{record.nextSnapshotVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NODE_COUNT = #{record.nodeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NEXT_DELETE_SEQUENCE = #{record.nextDeleteSequence,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_JOB_ID = #{record.lastJobId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FLOW_STATE = #{record.flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUMMARY = #{record.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_OPER = #{record.lastUpdateOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_OPER = #{record.createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=BIGINT},

update wf_flow set FLOW_ID = #{record.flowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLOW_NAME = #{record.flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{record.ownerProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNER_EXPERIMENT_ID = #{record.ownerExperimentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SHARE_LOCK_STATE = #{record.shareLockState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHARE_LOCK_MSG = #{record.shareLockMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEXT_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = #{record.nextSnapshotVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NODE_COUNT = #{record.nodeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NEXT_DELETE_SEQUENCE = #{record.nextDeleteSequence,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_JOB_ID = #{record.lastJobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLOW_STATE = #{record.flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUMMARY = #{record.summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{record.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_OPER = #{record.lastUpdateOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_OPER = #{record.createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{record.version,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wf_flow
FLOW_NAME = #{flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ownerProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
OWNER_EXPERIMENT_ID = #{ownerExperimentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SHARE_LOCK_STATE = #{shareLockState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SHARE_LOCK_MSG = #{shareLockMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEXT_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = #{nextSnapshotVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NODE_COUNT = #{nodeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT},
NEXT_DELETE_SEQUENCE = #{nextDeleteSequence,jdbcType=BIGINT},
LAST_JOB_ID = #{lastJobId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
FLOW_STATE = #{flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_OPER = #{lastUpdateOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_OPER = #{createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where FLOW_ID = #{flowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update wf_flow set FLOW_NAME = #{flowName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ownerProjectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OWNER_EXPERIMENT_ID = #{ownerExperimentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SHARE_LOCK_STATE = #{shareLockState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SHARE_LOCK_MSG = #{shareLockMsg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEXT_SNAPSHOT_VERSION = #{nextSnapshotVersion,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NODE_COUNT = #{nodeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, NEXT_DELETE_SEQUENCE = #{nextDeleteSequence,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LAST_JOB_ID = #{lastJobId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, FLOW_STATE = #{flowState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SUMMARY = #{summary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_OPER = #{lastUpdateOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_OPER = #{createOper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where FLOW_ID = #{flowId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
